summary: Seventeen states offer state tax credits for donations to organizations that fund scholarships for students to attend private schools. The President’s 2020 budget request proposes new federal tax credits for such donations. In 2017, scholarship organizations in these states received over $1.1 billion in donations. title: Private School Choice: Accountability in State Tax Credit Scholarship Programs
